verses.plain: O give thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: O give thanks unto the
, for
good: for his mercy
for ever.

verses.plain: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;

tokens.t: Let the redeemed of the
say
, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;

verses.plain: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.

tokens.t: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.

verses.plain: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.

tokens.t: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.

verses.plain: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.

tokens.t: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.

verses.plain: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.

tokens.t: Then they cried unto the
in their trouble,
he delivered them out of their distresses.

verses.plain: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.

tokens.t: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.

verses.plain: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

tokens.t: Oh that
would praise the
his goodness, and
his wonderful works to the children of men!

verses.plain: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.

tokens.t: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.

verses.plain: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron;

tokens.t: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death,
bound in affliction and iron;

verses.plain: Because they rebelled against the words of God, and contemned the counsel of the most High:

tokens.t: Because they rebelled against the words of God, and contemned the counsel of the most High:

verses.plain: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour; they fell down, and there was none to help.

tokens.t: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour; they fell down, and
none to help.

verses.plain: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.

tokens.t: Then they cried unto the
in their trouble,
he saved them out of their distresses.

verses.plain: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their bands in sunder.

tokens.t: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their bands in sunder.

verses.plain: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

tokens.t: Oh that
would praise the
his goodness, and
his wonderful works to the children of men!

verses.plain: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.

tokens.t: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.

verses.plain: Fools because of their transgression, and because of their iniquities, are afflicted.

tokens.t: Fools because of their transgression, and because of their iniquities, are afflicted.

verses.plain: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat; and they draw near unto the gates of death.

tokens.t: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat; and they draw near unto the gates of death.

verses.plain: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saveth them out of their distresses.

tokens.t: Then they cry unto the
in their trouble,
he saveth them out of their distresses.

verses.plain: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.

tokens.t: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered
from their destructions.

verses.plain: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

tokens.t: Oh that
would praise the
his goodness, and
his wonderful works to the children of men!

verses.plain: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.

tokens.t: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.

verses.plain: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;

tokens.t: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;

verses.plain: These see the works of the LORD, and his wonders in the deep.

tokens.t: These see the works of the
, and his wonders in the deep.

verses.plain: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.

tokens.t: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.

verses.plain: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.

tokens.t: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.

verses.plain: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wits’ end.

tokens.t: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wits’ end.

verses.plain: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.

tokens.t: Then they cry unto the
in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.

verses.plain: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.

tokens.t: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.

verses.plain: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.

tokens.t: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.

verses.plain: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

tokens.t: Oh that
would praise the
his goodness, and
his wonderful works to the children of men!

verses.plain: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.

tokens.t: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.

verses.plain: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;

tokens.t: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;

verses.plain: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.

tokens.t: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.

verses.plain: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.

tokens.t: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.

verses.plain: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;

tokens.t: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;

verses.plain: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.

tokens.t: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.

verses.plain: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.

tokens.t: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.

verses.plain: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.

tokens.t: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.

verses.plain: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness, where there is no way.

tokens.t: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness,
no way.

verses.plain: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh him families like a flock.

tokens.t: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh
families like a flock.

verses.plain: The righteous shall see it, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.

tokens.t: The righteous shall see
, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.

verses.plain: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.

tokens.t: Whoso
wise, and will observe these
, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the

footnotes.text: are…: Heb. all their wisdom is swallowed up
